com.here.android.mpa.mapping

Class TruckRestrictionsRasterTileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapRasterTileSource
      • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.UrlMapRasterTileSourceBase
        • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.TruckRestrictionsRasterTileSource
  • Deprecated. 
    As of SDK 3.0. Use Map.setFleetFeaturesVisible(EnumSet) instead.

    @Deprecated
public final class TruckRestrictionsRasterTileSource
extends UrlMapRasterTileSourceBase
    This class displays a transparent map tile overlay showing heavy vehicle route restrictions.

    NOTE: The locale (language) used by the raster tile source is fixed at the time of construction. Changes to the system default locale has no effect on an instance. Therefore, a new raster tile source instance must be created to adopt the new locale. A BroadcastReceiver can be implemented to monitor a change to the system default locale.

    See Also:
    Map.addRasterTileSource(MapRasterTileSource), Map.removeRasterTileSource(MapRasterTileSource)

    • Method Detail

      • getUrl

        public java.lang.String getUrl(int x,
                      int y,
                      int zoomLevel)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: UrlMapRasterTileSourceBase
        Gets the URL representing the source of the specified raster tile image.

        Note: implementations of raster tile sources must override this method to provide a complete URL string pointing to the raster tile image.

        Specified by:
        getUrl in class UrlMapRasterTileSourceBase
        Parameters:
        x - A current raster tile's X-coordinate
        y - A current raster tile's Y-coordinate
        zoomLevel - A current raster tile's zoom level
        Returns:
        The URL source for the raster tile image. Return null if an URL cannot be created.
